artist: Artist: Antoni Tàpies; Author: Joseph Brodsky; Publisher: Erker-Presse, St. Gallen, Switzerland
description: cardboard slip case with bands of dark brown fabric lining top and bottom; hardbound book inside with cardboard case; thick brown lines drawn in ink in URC and LRC; twelve loose folded prints inside with one main sheet as an outer wrapper; lender's archive #059
markings:
Numbered in black pen on colophon page: 51
Watermark: Arches [partial]
medium: Hand-drawn lithographs; letterpress; with screenprinted cardboard cover and compact disc
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
signed: Signed in black ink on colophon page: Joseph Brodsky │ Tàpies
title: Roman Elegies
